description.narrative: Capacity enhanced at state and district levels for planning, implementation, budgeting and public financial management for most disadvantaged children., which contributes to Child Poverty / Public Finance For Children, Child Protection â€“ Strengthen Families And Communities, Economic And Social Policy General, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Social Protection, Social Protection And Child Poverty. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Higher quality programmes through results-based management and improved accountability of results.

description.narrative: A dialogue on national-level, inter-ministerial social protection examined global evidence on integrated systems and innovative solutions while cash transfer-schemes for vulnerable groups, like girl children and child labourers across different states, led to improved, evidence-based policy development. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:15/01/2018

title.narrative: Number of States adopting child sensitive criteria into social protection schemes for girl children and marginalized families

target.value: 2015:1 flagship schemes at national level & 3 at state level which incorporate the findings from research

actual.value: 2017:UNICEF focussed on generating ground evidence from the states to improve national and state level policy for children.
